body:
I tested it with 1b6d55acab9199e09f9134ff3ac359647767f741. The `trace trap` is gone, its place is now taken by `fatal error: exitsyscall: syscall frame is no longer valid`

[14051-output-syscall-frame.txt](https://github.com/golang/go/files/100423/14051-output-syscall-frame.txt)

Should that go into a new ticket or will we continue this one?
